summary: A search and recovery team heads into the haunted swamp to pick up the pieces, and Marybeth learns the secret to ending the voodoo curse that has left Victor Crowley haunting and terrorizing Honey Island Swamp for decades.
cast: Danielle Harris|Kane Hodder|Zach Galligan|Caroline Williams|Parry Shen|Robert Diago DoQui|Derek Mears|Cody Blue Snider|Rileah Vanderbilt|Sean Whalen|Jason Trost|Diane Ayala Goldner|John Michael Sudol|Jamal Dennis|Thomas Tah Hyde III|Sarah Elbert|Eric Stratemeier|Nito Larioza|Guy Fernandez|Adam Green|Sid Haig|Jared DePasquale|Ted Geoghegan|Joel David Moore|Preston Trahan
title: Hatchet III
